summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of ORVITI Academy Digital Certificate Management Platform. Login and dashboard functionality work correctly with accurate data display (7 diplomas, 2 courses). Public verification page works perfectly. Major session persistence issue prevents navigation testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Session expires immediately after successful login preventing navigation between pages
ui_bugs.impact: Cannot test navigation flows - session lost when clicking sidebar links

ui_bugs.issue: Template Builder page loads but missing Konva canvas and variable buttons
Theme toggle button not found in UI

integration_issues.issue: Authentication token not persisting - immediate session expiration
affected_pages: All protected routes - Courses, Templates, Recipients, Diplomas

passed_tests: Login form loads correctly with pre-filled credentials
Login with admin@sety.com / admin123 works initially
Dashboard displays correct stats: 7 diplomas, 2 courses, 10 recipients
Dashboard shows proper Recent Activity with valid diplomas
Public verification page works perfectly with CERT-C6A8AF-1A2E
Verification page shows Juan PÃ©rez from Excel Avanzado course
Certificate displays as Valid with proper QR code
ORVITI Academy branding and styling consistent
User information displayed in sidebar (Admin User / admin@sety.com)
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (from previous iteration), Frontend: 50% (5/10 - login and dashboard work, public verification works, but navigation broken due to session issues)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix session persistence issue - authentication token expires immediately after login preventing any navigation. This blocks testing of all protected pages (Courses, Templates, Recipients, Diplomas). Also implement missing UI components: Theme toggle, Logout functionality, and complete Template Builder with Konva canvas.
